handoff_message: âœ… COMPLETE: Built four-gate failsafe enforcement system (nuclear-level defense-in-depth). GATE 1: Session start validator (catches protocol skip, auto-generates redirect). GATE 2: Behavior lint (catches forbidden phrases, links to docs+logs). GATE 3: Pre-commit hook (blocks bad commits, requires Gemini approval). GATE 4: Gemini cross-agent eval (validates Claude's work against 7 criteria). Pattern: Multiple independent layers - if one fails, next catches it. Files created: gate_1_session_start.py (271 lines), gate_2_behavior_lint.py (220 lines), gate_4_gemini_eval.py (340 lines), FOUR_GATE_SYSTEM.md (full docs). Updated: AI_AGENT_PROMPT.md (integrated all gates for human+agent), pre-commit hook (added Gate 8 for Gemini check). ALL GATES TESTED AND WORKING: Gate 1 caught bad session start, Gate 2 caught 2 violations, Gate 4 generated approval. Based on real patterns: GitHub branch protection, ESLint rules, nuclear reactor failsafes. Next session: Use gates to enforce protocol - if agent violates, run gate script and paste redirect. See .mosaic/enforcement/FOUR_GATE_SYSTEM.md for complete documentation.
